name: Evaluate mannix/jan-nano:iq4_xs - Ambiguous Process State
prompt:
Your monitoring shows conflicting signals:

Signal 1 - Application metrics:
- Response time: 180ms (target: 200ms) ✓
- Error rate: 0.05% (target: < 0.1%) ✓
- Throughput: 1200 req/s (normal) ✓

Signal 2 - Infrastructure metrics:
- CPU: 85% (high)
- Memory: 90% (high)
- Disk I/O: 95% (critical)
- Network: 40% (normal)

Signal 3 - User reports:
- 5 user complaints about "slow loading" in last 10 minutes
- All from same geographic region (EU)
- No specific error messages

Your application meets all technical SLAs, but users report issues.

What do you do? This requires judgment - explain your reasoning process.
